thread.title: Shia LaBeouf tweets following arrest
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf tweets following arrest - CBS News

author: Lauren Moraski CBS News
title: Shia LaBeouf tweets following arrest
text:
Shia LaBeouf chimed in on Twitter Sunday for the first time since his arrest on Friday in Austin, Texas.
The 29-year-old actor was charged with public intoxication after an incident in the city's Sixth Street entertainment district, nearby the Austin City Limits music festival.
On Sunday, LaBeouf tweeted, "I talk, just not to you." It's difficult to decipher what he meant by that, and if his comment has anything to do with Friday's arrest.
I talk, just not to you
â€” Shia LaBeouf (@thecampaignbook) October 11, 2015
32 Photos Celebrity mug shots Stars in hot water and in the news
LaBeouf previously made headlines for yelling from the audience during a Broadway show in 2014 and was charged with disorderly conduct and criminal trespass. He also garnered attention for wearing a paper bag on his head to a film premiere.
LaBeouf is known for his role in the "Transformers" franchise, and more recently appeared in 2014's "Fury" alongside Brad Pitt. He's attached to the upcoming film, "American Honey."
